name: Kaelback Rises
description:
You play as an eldritch being robbing graves to increase your length, fighting robots made to defend the graves of those that did not make it, at the tail end of the apocalypse. Consume, kill, grow. Never stop.

EDIT: in the current build there is a minor bug where the controls section of the main menu does not appear to work. Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to control, mouse to change direction of head, LMB to shoot.

For a first project, this was fairly simple to make, if it took a bit of time to work out *how* it would work. I hope whoever else submits that they had an awesome time making their game,  and that they enjoy the games they'll play to rate. Thank you and have a nice day. Made for the GoGodotJam (2021, theme: growth).
